name: Unstable Waters
description:
Introduction

Bring your gold through the rough waters!

Unstable Waters is a local coop game about balancing your ship so that you don't drop any gold through your voyage!

Controls

Keyboard

1st player: WASD keys

2nd player: Arrow keys

Controller (single controller)

1st player: Left joystick

2nd player: Right joystick

Rules

  • The ship will drop coins when out of balance.
  • 0 Coins and you LOSE!
  • Reach the island to win

Team

Yessica Servin https://twitter.com/Yessica_SD

Jaume Montagut https://twitter.com/Jaume_Montagut
